vps...ss

## 

sshdigital ocean


### 

```sh
$ ssh root@xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx
```

- xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx: ip



## shadowsocks

### ss

pip

```sh
$ sudo apt-get install python-pip
```

ss

```sh
$ pip install ss
```

...
```sh
  ~ pip install virtualenv
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/pip", line 11, in <module>
    sys.exit(main())
  File "/usr/lib/python3.4/site-packages/pip/__init__.py", line 215, in main
    locale.setlocale(locale.LC_ALL, '')
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.4/locale.py", line 592, in setlocale
    return _setlocale(category, locale)
locale.Error: unsupported locale setting
```
pip

```sh
$ sudo pip install --upgrade pip
```

### ss
```sh
$ sudo vim /etc/ss.json//json
```


```json
{
  "server":"ip",
  "server_port":"ss",
  "local_address":"127.0.0.1",
  "local_port":1080,
  "password":"",
  "timeout":300,
  "method":"aes-256-cfb",
  "fast_open":false
}
```

### ss

sslocal -help 
 
```sh
sslocal -c /etc/ss.json
```

ss

### 

/
```sh
$ sudo vi /etc/rc.local
```

`rc.local`

```md
/usr/local/bin/ssserver -c /etc/ss.json -d start
```

windowsshadowsocksip


![ss](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1626912-54a0f96665a84f34.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

mac/linux?

## vps



pptpd[github](https://github.com/viljoviitanen/setup-simple-pptp-vpn)

```sh
# 
$ wget https://raw.github.com/viljoviitanen/setup-simple-pptp-vpn/master/setup.sh

# 
$ sudo sh setup.sh

# 
$ sudo vim /etc/ppp/chap-secrets
```



```
#/etc/ppp/chap-secrets
# Secrets for authentication using CHAP
# client server secret IP addresses
vpn pptpd fAj-JwC-rLu *
```



- clientvpn  
- serverpptpd
- secretfAj-JwC-rLu      
- IP addresses* *ip

pptpd

```sh
$ service pptpd restart
```

### 

win10

VPN > VPN > 


![win10](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1626912-bfe3539e946abae9.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

Post.title: expressJWT
Post.content:
JWT
JSON Web Token - Web

JWT

JWTURL

  • (Compact): URLPOSTHTTP header;
  • (Self-contained);

JWT

JWT:

  • Headers
  • Payload
  • Signature

:
xxxxx.yyyyy.zzzzz

Headers

headers: token

  • alg:
  • typ: token

Payload

Token,claim,Claim(),claim: reserved,publicprivate.

  • Reserved claims:claimJWT,JWT,,:
  • iss()
  • exp()
  • sub()
  • aud()
  • iat()
  • Public claims: ,
  • Private claims: ,

:

Signature

headerspayload(secret),headers.HMAC SHA256,:

.

JWT

  • token(payloaduser_id)
  • token,token
  • token.:?token?token()?

nodejwt-simple

expressjwt-simplegithubexpress-jwt

token

token

sessionJWTJWT

Post.title: apidocAPI
Post._content:
> `node.js`

[apidoc](http://apidocjs.com)API

****

# apidoc

```sh
npm install -g apidoc
```

# 
```sh
apidoc -i myapp/ -o apidoc/ -t mytemplate/
```

- -i 
- -o 
- t 

`apidoc -h`

# apidoc.json

`apidoc.json`API
```json
{ 
  "name": "example", 
  "version": "0.1.0", 
  "description": "apiDoc basic example",
  "title": "Custom apiDoc browser title", 
  "url" : "https://api.github.com/v1"
}
```
`package.json`apidoc
```json
{ 
  "name": "example", 
  "version": "0.1.0", 
  "description": "apiDoc basic example", 
  "apidoc": { 
      "title": "Custom apiDoc browser title", 
      "url" : "https://api.github.com/v1" 
  }
}
```

# 

[apidoc](http://apidocjs.com)apidoc

## @api

`@api`[`@apiDefine`](http://apidocjs.com/#param-api-define)apidoc

```js
/** 
 * @api {method} path [title]
 */
```
| Name     | Description     |
| :------------- | :------------- |
| method       | `GET``POST`       |
| path        |   |
| title()        | |

## @apiGroup

apiapiapi

```js
/**
 * @apiGroup name
 */
```
| Name     | Description     |
| :------------- | :------------- |
| name       |       |


## @apiName 

`@apiName`API 

```js
/**
 * @apiName name
 */
```
| Name     | Description     |
| :------------- | :------------- |
| name       |       |

## @apiParam

`@apiParam`API

```js
/**
 * @apiParam [(group)] [{type}] [field=defaultValue] [description]
 */
```
| Name     | Description     |
| :------------- | :------------- |
| (group) ``       | `Paramter`      |
| {type} ``       | `{String}``{Number}``{Array}`      |
| {type{size}} `` |  `{String{..5}}`5`{String{2..5}}`25 |
| {type=allowedValues} `` |  `{string="small","huge"}``small``huge` |
| field ``       |       |
|  =defaultValue |  |
| description()       |       |

## @apiParamExample

`@apiParamExample`

```js
/**
 * @apiParamExample [{type}] [title]
 *    example
 */
```
| Name     | Description     |
| :------------- | :------------- |
| {type} ``       |       |
| title `` |  |
| example  |  |

## @apiSuccess



```js
/**
 * @apiSuccess [(group)] [{type}] field [description]
 */
```
| Name     | Description     |
| :------------- | :------------- |
| (group) ``       | `Success 200`      |
| {type} `` | `{String}``{Number}` |
| field  |  |
| description `` |  |

## @apiSuccessExample



```js
/**
 * @apiSuccessExample [{type}] [title] example
 */
```
| Name     | Description     |
| :------------- | :------------- |
| {type} ``       |       |
| title `` |  |
| example  |  |

## @apiError & @apiErrorExample

`@apiSuccess``@apiSuccessExample`

# 

idAPI

```js
/**
 * @api {get} /articles/:id id
 * @apiName id
 * @apiGroup Articles
 *
 * @apiParam (params) {String} id       id
 *
 * @apiSuccess {Array} article id
 *
 * @apiSuccessExample Success-Response:
 *    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
 *      {
 *        "tile": "2",
 *        "date": 1483941498230,
 *        "author": "classlfz",
 *        "content": ""
 *       }
 *
 * @apiError (Error 4xx) 404 id
 *
 * @apiErrorExample Error-Response:
 *     HTTP/1.1 404 id
 *     {
 *       "error": err
 *     }
 */
```

`apidoc -i src/ -o docs`docs`index.html`API

![FireShot Capture 1 - Custom apiDoc browser title_ - file____home_classlfz_github_expres.png](http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/1626912-5555c6d326baadf2.png?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240)

APIwordmdAPI......

[github](https://github.com/)[github pages](https://pages.github.com/)[API](http://www.jianshu.com/p/f8cec06f2d8b)

# gulp

gulpgulpapidoc

## 

```sh
npm install gulp gulp-apidoc --save-dev
```

## gulp

```js
// apidoc
gulp.task('apidoc', (done) => {
  apidoc({
    src: 'src/',
    dest: 'docs',
    debug: true,
    includeFilters: ['.*\\.js$']
  }, done);
});
```
